languages.text: Кристалл таинственно сияет, обрамляя начатую скульптором фигуру — удивительно похожую на вас.
The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.
languages.original_text: Кристалл таинственно сияет, обрамляя начатую скульптором фигуру — удивительно похожую на вас.

traits.locale_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

languages.text: Der Kristall schimmert geheimnisvoll und erhellt das entstehende Werk des Skulpteurs, das dir erstaunlich ähnlich sieht.
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: Der Kristall schimmert geheimnisvoll und erhellt das entstehende Werk des Skulpteurs, das dir erstaunlich ähnlich sieht.

languages.text: Kristal, esrarengiz bir şekilde parlayıp heykeltıraşın sana çarpıcı bir benzerlik taşıyan eserinin ilk hâlini çerçeveliyor.
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: Kristal, esrarengiz bir şekilde parlayıp heykeltıraşın sana çarpıcı bir benzerlik taşıyan eserinin ilk hâlini çerçeveliyor.

languages.text: Le cristal brille d'une lueur mystérieuse, éclairant ainsi l'ébauche de l'artiste, une sculpture aux traits ressemblant étrangement aux vôtres.
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: Le cristal brille d'une lueur mystérieuse, éclairant ainsi l'ébauche de l'artiste, une sculpture aux traits ressemblant étrangement aux vôtres.

languages.text: El cristal emite un brillo misterioso que rodea la recién empezada obra del escultor, que guarda un parecido asombroso contigo.
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: El cristal emite un brillo misterioso que rodea la recién empezada obra del escultor, que guarda un parecido asombroso contigo.

languages.text: 水晶发出了神秘的光芒，雕塑在雕刻师的手中慢慢成型，与你的样子几乎毫无二致。
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: 水晶发出了神秘的光芒，雕塑在雕刻师的手中慢慢成型，与你的样子几乎毫无二致。

languages.text: その水晶は神秘的に輝き、彫刻家の創作の起点を形作っている。その作品はあなたに驚くほどよく似ていた。
languages.original_text: The crystal glows enigmatically, framing the beginning of the sculptor's creation, which bears a striking resemblance to you.

traits.locale_text: その水晶は神秘的に輝き、彫刻家の創作の起点を形作っている。その作品はあなたに驚くほどよく似ていた。
